casebody.data:
HARTLEY
v.
HARTLEY. No. 307A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2007. J. Clark Fischer, Winston-Salem, for Teresa Hartley.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of September 2007 by Defendant to Deem Brief Timely Filed:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of November 2007."
